name: minio
description: MinIO is a High Performance Object Storage solution that is API compatible with Amazon S3 cloud storage service. It can be used for high performance backup targets for Hadoop, Spark and Kubernetes workloads.
values:
# MinIO configuration
# Ref: https://github.com/minio/operator/blob/master/helm/minio/values.yaml

## Global settings
global:
  imageRegistry: ""
  imagePullSecrets: []
  storageClass: ""

## MinIO settings
minio:
  ## MinIO image settings
  image:
    repository: minio/minio
    tag: "RELEASE.2025-10-01T08-06-45Z"
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  ## MinIO server mode
  ## Options: standalone, distributed
  mode: "standalone"
  
  ## Number of MinIO servers (for distributed mode)
  replicas: 4
  
  ## MinIO server configuration
  config:
    ## Access key for MinIO
    accessKey: "minioadmin"
    ## Secret key for MinIO
    secretKey: "minioadmin"
    
    ## MinIO server configuration options
    config:
      region: "us-east-1"
      browser: "on"
      domain: ""
      
    ## TLS settings
    tls:
      enabled: false
      certSecret: ""
      publicCrt: "public.crt"
      privateKey: "private.key"
  
  ## Resources settings
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 1Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 512Mi
  
  ## Persistence settings
  persistence:
    enabled: true
    size: 50Gi
    storageClass: ""
    accessMode: ReadWriteOnce
    
    ## SubPath for persistence
    subPath: ""
  
  ## Service settings
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 9000
    securePort: 9001
    annotations: {}
    
    ## Node port settings (if service type is NodePort)
    nodePort: ""
    secureNodePort: ""
  
  ## Ingress settings
ingress:
    enabled: false
    annotations: {}
      # kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
      # kubernetes.io/tls-acres: "true"
    hosts:
      - host: minio.example.local
        paths:
          - path: /
            pathType: Prefix
    tls: []
    #  - secretName: minio-tls
    #    hosts:
    #      - minio.example.local
  
  ## Environment variables
  environment: {}
  
  ## Command to run MinIO server
  command: ["/usr/bin/docker-entrypoint.sh"]
  
  ## Args for MinIO server
  args: ["server", "/data"]
  
  ## Liveness probe settings
  livenessProbe:
    enabled: true
    initialDelaySeconds: 30
    periodSeconds: 10
    timeoutSeconds: 5
    failureThreshold: 3
    successThreshold: 1
  
  ## Readiness probe settings
  readinessProbe:
    enabled: true
    initialDelaySeconds: 5
    periodSeconds: 10
    timeoutSeconds: 5
    failureThreshold: 3
    successThreshold: 1
  
  ## Startup probe settings
  startupProbe:
    enabled: true
    initialDelaySeconds: 0
    periodSeconds: 10
    timeoutSeconds: 5
    failureThreshold: 60
    successThreshold: 1

## Console settings (MinIO Console)
console:
  enabled: true
  
  image:
    repository: minio/console
    tag: "v1.1.0"
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  replicas: 1
  
  ## Console service settings
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 9090
    annotations: {}
  
  ## Console ingress settings
  ingress:
    enabled: false
    annotations: {}
    hosts:
      - host: console.minio.example.local
        paths:
          - path: /
            pathType: Prefix
    tls: []
  
  ## Console resources
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 512Mi
    requests:
      cpu: 250m
      memory: 256Mi

## Metrics settings
metrics:
  enabled: false
  serviceMonitor:
    enabled: false
  prometheusRule:
    enabled: false

## Security context
securityContext: {}
  # runAsUser: 1000
  # runAsGroup: 1000
  # fsGroup: 1000

## Service account
serviceAccount:
  create: true
  name: ""

## Pod security context
podSecurityContext: {}
  # fsGroup: 1000

## Node selector
nodeSelector: {}

## Tolerations
tolerations: []

## Affinity
affinity: {}

## Priority class
priorityClassName: ""

## Topology spread constraints
topologySpreadConstraints: []

## Extra volumes
extraVolumes: []

## Extra volume mounts
extraVolumeMounts: []
